title: Rough Resurrection
short_desc: In the aftermath of their encounter with Dread, the crew finds a way to bring their friends back.

title: Deep Space Dangers
short_desc: After weeks without food, the crew passes through a toll booth and manages to crash the ship again.

title: Dam Hooligans
short_desc: The crew pillages a local village on Rivalri-2 and finds themselves in a bit of a pickle.

title: Bark and Bite
short_desc: Relaxing from their recent escapades, the crew pulls a prank that goes horribly wrong.

title: Feel the Heat
short_desc: Upon finding a map, the crew heads to a planet of demons and finds themselves betrayed.

title: Lap of the Gods
short_desc: After losing another crew member, tensions rise, and the crew finds themselves in a battle between gods.
